column5: Well fall is here and the colours are spectacular this year thanks to all the rain this summer and good conditions so far this fall so here a few pics of the fall colours from my cottage on Lower Buckhorn north of Peterborough so lets see some of your fall colour pics from elsewhere around Ontario or from anywhere as this is the time to take advantage of this short time of the beauty of mother nature. So Enjoy!!!  Kawartha Kev
Awesome fall scenic colors kev !!!   almost looks like a post card. thanks for sharing with us !!!   happy thanksgiving...cheers
That's a real nice place you have Thanks for sharing Leechman
Beautiful pics Kev.  Looks so nice with that beautiful blue sky  Cheers  Craig
Nice pics. I hope to get up there next weekend.

Nice pics! Heres a few from up Haliburton way over the past couple of weeks. Best time of year, IMO. Especially considering the summer we had this year, this weekend was really one to be thankful for!          My favourite fall colour...
